tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ad_spend_roi_metrics (
    campaign_id UUID NOT NULL,
    ad_id UUID NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    spend DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    revenue DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    roi DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE roi_metrics (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    roi DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE roi_metrics (
    roi_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ad_spend (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INTEGER,
    ad_group_id INTEGER,
    ad_id INTEGER,
    amount DECIMAL,
    date Date
);

CREATE TABLE roi_metrics (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INTEGER,
    ad_group_id INTEGER,
    ad_id INTEGER,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    clicks INTEGER,
    impressions INTEGER,
    date Date
);

CREATE TABLE ppc_advertising (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255),
    ad_platform VARCHAR(50),
    ad_cost DECIMAL,
    ad_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_spend_metrics (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id UUID,
  ad_group_id UUID,
  spend DECIMAL,
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE roi_metrics (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id UUID,
  ad_group_id UUID,
  revenue DECIMAL,
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE budget_allocation (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id UUID,
  budget DECIMAL,
  allocated_amount DECIMAL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(50),
  budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_groups (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  group_name VARCHAR(255),
  campaign_id UUID,
  status VARCHAR(50),
  target_audience VARCHAR(255)
);
